scenes.action_text: BRIDESMAIDS Written by Annie Mumolo 8/12/09 INT. CLEAN, UPSCALE. MODERN BATHROOM. Annie is in nice lingerie, happily getting ready for the day. She puts a lot of effort into her appearance. Products everywhere, too many hair-flips, eye-cream, no hair out of place. She walks into the bedroom, where TED, a gorgeous man sleeps.
